queries.home_maps: select ams.country_code, country_label, afo_footprint, manufacturing_plant, blending_plant from afo_map_slider ams, codes_countries cc where ams.country_code = cc.country_code
queries.fertilizers_tree: select fc.fertilizer_class as group, fc.fertilizer_code as id, cf.fertilizer_label as text from fertilizers_class fc, codes_fertilizers cf where fc.fertilizer_code = cf.fertilizer_code order by fc.fertilizer_class
queries.fertilizers_country: select distinct country_code from fertilizers_country where fertilizer_code in ( <%= fertilizersList %> )
queries.regions: select country_code, country_label from codes_countries where parent_code = '' order by country_code
queries.countries_byregion: SELECT country_code, country_label FROM codes_countries WHERE parent_code = <%= id %>
queries.countries_geojson: SELECT ST_AsGeoJSON(geom), adm0_code, areanamee FROM spatial.gaul0_faostat3_4326 WHERE adm0_code IN ( <%= ids %> )
queries.countries_groups: SELECT country, name FROM countries WHERE value = 1 AND name IN ( <%= ids %> )
queries.select_from_compare: select element_code, element_label, year, coalesce(value, -1), um from ( select element, year, value, um from compare where data_source = 'ifa' and fertilizer = '2510000000' and country = '133' and n_p = 'p' )c right join codes_elements on element = element_code ORDER BY element ASC, year ASC
